website_summaries.verdict: A thoughtfully-designed manual sharpener with features that make it easy to handle and use.
pros: Made for use with both Asian and European blades
Well-designed handle makes this sharpener easy and safe to use
Tough carbide steel blade for phase 1 sharpening
Constructed with a rubberized base to prevent slips
cons: Questionable longevity, on both the sharpener and the sharpened blades

customer_reviews.title: Like Michael Scott with the gabagool, I send it back!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. I'm a fairly experienced sharpener, & I sharpen all of my knives on whetstones, freehand. I wanted to get something for my parents to use, to maintain the edges on their knives. I applaud Whustof for trying, but for the life of me, I could not get this thing to put a proper angle on a knife. I tried a few cheap knives & one Henckels (same angle as Wusthofs). The coarse carbide just ground a ragged edge.....I wanted to like this thing, but I just couldn't. Maybe I got a dud. Seller sent it quickly, no problems there.
customer_reviews.author: Nakmuay

customer_reviews.title: Good results but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I really love the results generated by this sharpner. Knives get sharp and it is easy to use. Run your knive 5-6 times on the roller in fwd direction qnd its done. I often (biweekly) use ss honing stick to keep edges bright and use this sharpner on knives once in 2-3 months. There are few major flaws in it. - it outwears very fast in just 6 minths after sharpening 7-8 knives the rollors are gone more than 50%. - it creates pits along the edges for cheap/low quality knives - it receives cuts at plastic next to rollors
customer_reviews.author: rock_boxzy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, not particularly sharp
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener is quick and easy to use, but it does a disappointing job actually sharpening the knife. The coarse sharpener is very aggressive and can leave small notches on the blade. The fine stage isn't really all that fine. If you cannot bear the idea of sharpening a knife manually then this will technically work. A whetstone or a Lansky kit will do a much much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Generalissimo Serebryannikov

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This knife sharpener has worked very well for what I needed it for. I have been able to keep all of my knives sharp so that and I can use this very quickly right before I start cooking. The handle of the sharpener make the product very easy to use and the clear labeling and clear guard helps remind me which sharpening area to use depending on the blade. While this does not get my blades super sharp, it definitely gets them sharp enough to make my life easier and my cooking experience less frustrating. I would recommend this product if you struggle with traditional sharpening stones.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Ensign

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!! You will ruin your knives!!!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research, my husband and I chose to purchase this knife sharpener for our Wusthof knives (chef and santoku). My husband decided to start sharpening the santoku knife first in the Asian knife slots. Needless to say our knife is somehow duller than before he sharpened it! This is not the first knife he has sharpened. We finally got a chance to use this product after the short return window. We are now sending our knives directly to Wusthof for them to hopefully be sharpened. Don't waste your money on this product or the chance that you might have to replace your expensive knives.
customer_reviews.author: Marylynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price, very efficient and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife sharpener which keeps both Asian and standard blades sharp and in optimal condition at all times. The coarse grit is made of metal then the next step is to use the ceramic fine blade sharpener. I only want the best for my knives as a culinary student and for one who knows that good knives aren’t cheap, and maintaining them is extremely important. I always trust wusthof with any of my knife needs and I would recommend this knife sharpener to anybody, wether home or professional cook.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Love my knife sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Amazon and took a chance to try it out! So glad I did, I kept using that sharpener with the handle that comes with your knives, and it's hard to stand there and use it. This makes life bearable, and I'm sure if you have the $$ you can purchase and electric one. This is so easy to use first coarse then fine and now my knives are always sharp! Really nice and it works great for the price! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Bound

customer_reviews.title: Most likely a factory issue but none the less a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a prior model, less expensive and works well. This product only addresses one side of the blade and actually caused the edge of the knife to be reworked entirely on another sharpener. Most likely a factory issue but none the less a waste of time and money. Bit the bullet and purchased Chefs Choice electric sharpener and happily put this item in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Baca

customer_reviews.title: Great quailty & price.  Grips counter so it does not move about while you sharpen blades.  I rate this a BUY
customer_reviews.text: This has both the 18 degree Wustoff coarse / fine settings and Japanese settings. The grip is very comfortable and the base is very sturdy and grips the counter. I found it only takes a few swipes to keep the blades sharp.
customer_reviews.author: RobertTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great investment to keep your knives sharp!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite knives have been getting dull for some time, and I really didn't want to replace them... so we decided to try this sharpener. It's a great choice! So easy to sharpen in just 2 steps, and it works like a dream on regular, serrated, and sandoku knives. Definitely a good investment to keep my knives cutting smoothly for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this wusthof sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this wusthof sharpener. I have their knives which are over 30 years old & I have always used their sharpening stone. I thought this sharpener would be a little quicker and still do a good job. Not the case & I have been using it for about 1 yr. Not going to throw it away, but not that great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. This is an all in one sharpener for conventional and santoku knife blades. I own two similar Wusthof sharpeners that are dedicated one to each type of blade. They work great so can’t imagine this combined unit does not work equally well. Like that they’ve combined into one sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sharpen very smoothly without a lubricant
customer_reviews.text: The directions tell you to avoid water when using it (it'll leak into the base, as I've tested that), but the filings build up on the cutter and grab the blade, making sharpening your knife more difficult than necessary. I'm using water when sharpening and just living with the now wet and leaky base.
customer_reviews.author: Just some average guy

customer_reviews.title: Sent in 2 packages
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent me a free blade guard that I don’t want or need. It was the tracked Amazon package, which I found inappropriate since the actual sharpener came in a separate package (wasteful) a day or two later. If they’re trying to be nice, just throw it in with the purchase - don’t send it separately. The whole thing felt very weird/shady to me. The sharpener is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: A GAMBLE
customer_reviews.text: Removes LOTS of steel from the knife without sharpening. I'm sure I just got a bad one. Take a chance if you like.
customer_reviews.author: lownoter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last Two Years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in July, 2018. By May, 2020 it was dulling the blade of any knife I pulled through it, completely ruining the edge. Had to go back to using a steel to get an edge back on the blade. Would not buy this item again. Very disappointed in this produce given the company's reputation for it's cutlery.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Hearne

customer_reviews.title: I now know what the other bad reviews are all about
customer_reviews.text: Liked it at first but... After 3-4 months my wife started complaining that her knives seemed to never hold an edge after using his. Now after a year we see that the stones are worn or broken. Probably have been doing more damage than good.
customer_reviews.author: Olson jr

customer_reviews.title: Right Sized, Hones Very Well... Glad that I Bought Wusthof's Small Sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect blade placement is automatic given blade guides... works for both classic and asian blade angles. Find that I keep better edges as this is so much quicker to use on blades that just need to re-hone their cutting edge than our getting out our electric sharpener. Have a steak knife that lost it's edge... a few swipes and it is ready for use... that's quick, effective and easy.
customer_reviews.author: finyin

customer_reviews.title: Great easy sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple to use and does the trick, as long as you are not abusing your cutlery beyond reason. I replaced two older similar Wusthof sharpeners with this single one which accommodates both regular and Asian-style knives. I withhold one star only because one of the old sharpeners (no longer available) also had a sharpener for kitchen shears, and there does not seem to be a similar offering anymore. So call it 4.5.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Knecht

customer_reviews.title: Essential Tool
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a no-brainer knife sharpener!! My ability to recognize the optimal angle when using a steel is a bit lacking, so just having to guesstimate 90 degrees to operate this tool effectively for Standard or Asian blades is great. Always having an adequately sharpened knife makes prep work a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Insuranceproaw

customer_reviews.title: This works fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastic. I have elec. and a tarmac that cost about $1,000.00 and this works. I like my knifes sharp, so I can shave the hair on my arm and this will do that and very easy. I have R/A bad and it is easy to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Significantly better than the cheaper models
customer_reviews.text: I sharpen knives many times in a day in my business. I've purchased cheaper models in the past that worked fine until I experienced the sharpness after using the Wusthof sharpener. The Wusthof product is provides a quick sharp edge without much effort. Well worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Wusthof knives, go figure!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my Wusthof knives that were getting a little dull after litterally years of use, now they're like new and really didn't require much honing at all. The device is super easy to use and as long as you use it for knives that are of a high quality to begin with then I don't see how you would have any issues! This did not work well however for the "commercially" higher end knives that I have that claim to be of a high quality but really are just hype.
customer_reviews.author: Kikibee

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: We are big fans of this brand and owe several of their knives. This sharpener did not disappoint....husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener is so useful because it sharpens every size and shape of knife that I have. I use Wusthof and JA Henkel knives so it is important to keep them sharp, once they are sharp they stay that way for a while a long time. Since this sharpener is made by Wusthof Cutlery Equipment, I trust that it will not damage my blades. I also cook quite a bit so I need my knives in top shape.
customer_reviews.author: docee

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener/honer
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener is outstanding and easily hones Asian and European knives. I've had to use the sharpener function only once on an old knife. Metal flakes were generated, but after I honed it, it was as sharp as the newer knives. I've had my newer Wusthof knives for only a year, but this honer/sharpener has kept them amazingly sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N. Lionsden

customer_reviews.title: Must have this in every home!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sharpener. Keeps all our knives and scissors crazy sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are buying Wusthof knife set
customer_reviews.text: Works well, like the different sharpening sections. Really puts a fine hone on my Wusthof knives. Have not tried it for any other knife.
customer_reviews.author: Len R.

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Not too pricey and pretty easy to use. Works pretty good. I’d recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: Invested in Wusthof knives for their sharpness. Needed a precision tool to maintain that sharpness. This does it. Easy to grip, non-slip bottom, choice between fine and coarse blades. It does what it advertized.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bamazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This knife sharpener is wonderful. I have Wusthof knives and they are always extremely sharp thanks to this sharpener. Great product - highly recommend for Wusthof and other brand knives.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaj

customer_reviews.title: Flawed product
customer_reviews.text: Have Henkels set with sharpening steel, which worked fine until the chef's knife got abused. This sharpener seemed to repair the blade on the coarse slot, but the fine slot simply dulled the blade. Using the coarse side with sharpening steel at least made the knife usable though nowhere near to its original sharpness. I suspect the fine ceramic side is simply faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets it done
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, especially for the Asian style knives. Brings the edge up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scriv

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof precision
customer_reviews.text: Like all Wusthof products this is really exceptional! After using it I think the knives are sharper than when they were new.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Knifes are sharp as new again, be sure to use correct side or you’ll make a costly mistake. Just read the instructions
customer_reviews.author: Ksmith

customer_reviews.title: Wustof Precision Edge 4 Stage Knife Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Wustof knives, or anything with a similar grind. Maybe it's not the "best" way to sharpen a knife, but the main thing is that it's quick and adequate enough for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Batman_Bin_SuparmanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to to make the most out of it. The instructions are adequate, but not perfect for getting the best out of the sharpener. When using the fine slot, you must be very, very light touch. This isn't clear in the instructions. However, used correctly (very light touch in the fine slot) it will put a razor edge on you knives. A few (light) swipes before each use will keep your knife so sharp you can cut a ripe tomato effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Trust

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: my knives are really old and it did put a sharp edge on them
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: Use this with Wusthof knifes to keep the edge. Easy to use and for a year has been keeping the knifes sharp.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: No More Dull Knives -- Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a suitable knife sharpener for my Wusthof and Henkels knives, and this is it! I thought I would have to use a wet stone, until I found this beauty. It sharpens both standard and asian blade knives, without taking too much away from the edge. My knives have never been sharper, and I'll never put up with dull knives again.
customer_reviews.author: umberto314

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my Japanese knives!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a knife sharpener to use with my new Japanese knives (which require different sharpening angles). This does the trick. So happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal guy

customer_reviews.title: ... that are 14 years old and had become quite dull. I was hoping to revitalize them and recover ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a set of Wusthof Trident knives that are 14 years old and had become quite dull. I was hoping to revitalize them and recover their original razor-sharp edge. When the sharpener arrived I immediately put it to the test. The sharpener removed just enough metal to recreate the appropriate angle and impressively brought them back to life. They are now razor sharp. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JWN III

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this as a gift and she is thrilled with it. She was fearful of sharpening her Wusthof knives until she got this and now feels comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: jane link

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all of my knifes razor sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great knife sharpener! I had a chef's knife with a chunk taken out of the blade. I had to regrind it and then this sharpener put a razor-like edge back on my favorite knife! Keeps all of my knifes razor sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stamped Steel Knives
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener has been invaluable in keeping my cheaper stamped steel knife set as sharp as the day I took them out of the box. just five pulls through each of the two slots for standard blades and my Chef's Knife is ready to cut anything. Maybe one day I'll be able to buy some real forged steel blades, but this has kept me satisfied for now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Sideleau

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen purchase I made this year.
customer_reviews.text: My chef's steel wasn't creating the edge I expected anymore. A couple of clean swipes and a little chef's steel and my knives are as good as new. I'm loving this widget.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good for all your straight edge knives.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sharpener. I bought it to use on my Wusthof knives but they haven't needed sharpening yet. I used it on my old, cheap knives and it really did a great job sharpening them. Easy to use and works with large or small blades!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much to sharpen my knife set
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item several times based on the youtube video. My knifes didn't sharpen as good as they describe they should. I can't recommend this knife sharpener for sharpening my JA Heckles knife set. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: clayton

customer_reviews.title: This worked great to sharpen up my mid range kitchen knives
customer_reviews.text: This worked great to sharpen up my mid range kitchen knives. They are not cheapies but not so high end I want to pay someone to sharpen them either. This fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie W

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Forget any bad reviews. I used this and brought dull knives back to life with a few stokes.
customer_reviews.author: scarso63

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to using this. Now I'm saying...steel what? I still will use my steel to tone though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific - wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic - needed an asian 10 degree easy to use sharpener
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great for old knives
customer_reviews.text: Man, this did a great bit of work on my old knives. I bought a few used knives that came to me really beat up, but were much cheaper than the new version. Thanks to this sharpener, I really can't tell the difference anymore. Honing steels always seem to get me different results, but this flat sharpener is very consistent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trent H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps my knives sharp. I do need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my knives sharp. I do need to wipe off the burrs after sharpening. Minor points taken off for the inconvenience but I expect that is typical for most sharpeners.
customer_reviews.author: Krazylady

customer_reviews.title: Great Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Great sharpen that can travel. I compete in Meat smoking Comps. I need to keep my knives sharp. I can't sharpen a knife or steel them so this works great. Has both commonly used angles on aa good knifes
customer_reviews.author: Butchiez51

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product - works perfectly! Produces a very sharp edge easily.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosECarlos

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: After many years of hard use , needed a replacement! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Francis X. Westermann

customer_reviews.title: This is great, especially if combined with a sharpening steel
customer_reviews.text: This is great, especially if combined with a sharpening steel, I especially like the Asian sharpener for 2 Asian knives I use.
customer_reviews.author: Loren D. Acord

customer_reviews.title: Plastic goodness.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Slightly expensive. A bit bigger than I imagined. Doesn’t fit into my drawer that well. But good!
customer_reviews.author: Nizam

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sharpen my Wustof Ikon knife set, but it did not work. In fact it seem to strip the edge off my knives and make them worse than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Go for a pair of Japanese whetstones  instead.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product is absolute junk. Wish I could return it. It just strips alot of metal and barely leaves an edge. I recommending spending as little as $35 on Japanese whetstones and watching videos on youtube. Its really not hard to learn how to put a fine edge on any knife. If I can learn so can anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Keeps my knives razor sharp with very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps my knives razor sharp with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Barton1404

customer_reviews.title: It's safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The way the sharpener is constructed so that it is easy to hold and has the right size sharpener slots for the knives.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M. Berra

customer_reviews.title: Why are your knives so dull?
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Sharpened my horribly dull knives very quickly and I can keep them sharp by quickly using the fine stone. I highly recommend this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: DrAudio

customer_reviews.title: Made my knives dull
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. My knives are dull as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Leen

customer_reviews.title: Product value for cost.
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened knives, albeit not as when first purchased, quickly to an edge making cutting very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Already used it!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how dull my knives had become and this sharpener not only sharpens my regular blade knives but also my Asian blade knives... I love that I don't have to take them to a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Marti S

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work okay. The knives don't seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work okay. The knives don't seem to hold the sharpness. It could be me?
customer_reviews.author: PLRS

customer_reviews.title: It really sharpens .
customer_reviews.text: Yes it does ,had to get used to holding the knife to be sharpened at the right angle .I have used an electric sharpener before that cost over $60 but does not sharpen any better than this .Bottom line I like it.
customer_reviews.author: hp1480

customer_reviews.title: Bad results from carbide stage
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. The ceramic stage is fine, *if* your edge is at the proper angle. But getting that angle requires using the carbide stage, which literally "scrapes" steel from the knife. That scraping action leaves a jagged edge, even tearing chunks of steel away leaving significant nicks in the edge. After trying a second one to make sure the first wasn't defective, I gave up and bought a 10" DMT Fine/ExFine diamond plate - more expensive and took a little practice, but far better results and no damage to my knives.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it says and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says and is easy to use . It would have got 5 stars but for the limited instructions and price , Made in china
customer_reviews.author: Retired Sam

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this product. I've now tested it on a series of different Japanese knives as well as Wusthof knives. It does a decent job on the German steel for a quick refinement of the edge. My Japanese knives were practically wrecked by the sharpener, and I went back to my tried and true whetstones. Nothing beats them. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: drpynchon

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix for a sharp blade.
customer_reviews.text: While I do have a whetstone for the manual labor of sharpening my knives, this is a quick fix for when I can't spend an evening back-and-forth on the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L.

customer_reviews.title: Made knives like new again
customer_reviews.text: A few light strokes and the knives came back to life...outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Knife Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Although it was bought for the lady of the house, I used it for her and found it seemed to work quite well on those hardened blades that normal knife sharpeners wouldn't do much on.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I like being able to sharpen knives from different parts of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to sharpen knives from different parts of the world. So far I have sharp knives with no damage to the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Works poorly. I'm buying a real stone. Giving it away. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morris

customer_reviews.title: boning & fish filet and it does a nice job. The wider base makes it easy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've sharpened my older knives, boning & fish filet and it does a nice job. The wider base makes it easy and is very stable. Not much pressure to cut and the honing stone works well. While I still like a steel sharpener, this takes any alignment guesswork out for a good angle.
customer_reviews.author: fwk

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: The slot for regular knives stopped sharpening (ceramic wore off). I'm going to contact Wusthof to see about a refund. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penney
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily.. keep all knives sharpened and/ or honed. What a difference a sharp edge makes in food preparation!
customer_reviews.author: tosca

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Better than previous sharpeners I've used. Knives are sharper than ever.
customer_reviews.author: flyer549

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and sharpens western and eastern knives. Does a good job of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: como

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sharpener. Sharpens a variety of blade sizes and shapes quickly. Easy to use, even for those who have arthritis in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: USE ALMOST EVERY DAY -TRIM MY OWN ROASTS FROM CATTLE FARM
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great knife sharpener, used it for my wisthof knives. Easy to use, worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: cjy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great for both kinds of knives. Very easy to use. I constantly have sharp knives.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever. You really need nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. You really need nothing else. Nothing fancy. Just this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiemo Klisch

customer_reviews.title: your kitchen needs this utensil
customer_reviews.text: Knife sharpener works easily for both American and Asian knives, coarse and fine edges. Easy to put a fine edge on.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: very convenient and easy to
customer_reviews.text: gave one to my husband and one to my stepson...very convenient and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Just OK

product_meta.title: Wusthof Precision Edge 4 Stage Knife Sharpener
product_meta.description: Thoughtfully crafted and meticulously designed in Germany, manufactured in China. Family owned for seven generations, WÜSTHOF was founded in Solingen, Germany over 200 years ago.
feature_bullets: Sharpens Standard and Asian style knives
Hard carbide steel blades for coarse sharpening stage
Weighted to be safe and secure
